00025 #include <FdoStd.h>
00026 #include <fdo/Expression/Identifier.h>
00027 #include <fdo/Filter/SearchCondition.h>
00028 
00029 /// \brief
00030 /// The FdoGeometricCondition abstract class derives from FdoSearchCondition and can
00031 /// be used to test whether the value of a geometric property meets a particular
00032 /// spatial criteria. FdoGeometricCondition is the base class for FdoDistanceCondition
00033 /// and FdoSpatialCondition.
00034 class FdoGeometricCondition : public FdoSearchCondition
00035 {
00036 protected:
00037 /// \cond DOXYGEN-IGNORE
00038     /// Constructs a default instance of an FdoGeometricCondition.
00039     FdoGeometricCondition();
00040 
00041     /// Constructs an instance of an FdoGeometricCondition using the specified
00042     /// arguments.
00043     FdoGeometricCondition(GisString* propertyName);
00044 
00045     /// Constructs an instance of an FdoGeometricCondition using the specified
00046     /// arguments.
00047     FdoGeometricCondition(FdoIdentifier* propertyName);
00048 
00049     virtual ~FdoGeometricCondition();
00050 /// \endcond
00051 
00052 public:
00053     /// \brief
00054     /// Gets the name of the geometric property.
00055     /// 
00056     /// \return
00057     /// Returns the name of the geometric property
00058     /// 
00059     FDO_API FdoIdentifier* GetPropertyName();
00060 
00061     /// \brief
00062     /// Sets the name of the geometric property.
00063     /// 
00064     /// \param value 
00065     /// Input the name of the geometric property
00066     /// 
00067     /// \return
00068     /// Returns nothing
00069     /// 
00070     FDO_API void SetPropertyName(FdoIdentifier* value);
00071 
00072 private:
00073     FdoIdentifier*  m_geometricPropertyName;
00074 };
00075 #endif
